com.maestrodev.maestro.plugins
Class MaestroWorker

java.lang.Object
  com.maestrodev.maestro.plugins.MaestroWorker

public class MaestroWorker
extends Object

Helper Class for Maestro Plugins written in Java. The lifecycle of the plugin starts with a call to setStompConfig(Map) and then the main entry point is perform(String, Map), called by the Maestro agent, all the other methods are helpers that can be used to deal with parsing, errors, etc.

Constructor Summary
protected MaestroWorker()
          Creates a new instance with the default StompConnectionFactory.
protected MaestroWorker(StompConnectionFactory stompConnectionFactory)
          Creates a new instance with the specified StompConnectionFactory.

getArrayField

public <T> List<T> getArrayField(Class<T> clazz,
                                 String field)
Returns the specified array field from the work item. Caveat: lists of integers are returned as lists of longs

Parameters:
clazz - the type of object contained in the field's array.
field - key to get value for
